channel.title: 1 and 2 - Introduction to Jewish History
channel.itunes:description: Journey through the pages of time from the Jewish perspective. Vivid, illuminating, and always entertaining, Rabbi Ken Spiro presents a "Crash Course in Jewish History" as fresh as current events and as descriptive as eyewitness news. So get ready for a dash through "Jewish time" and don't worry if you're late.
channel.itunes:author: Rabbi Ken Spiro
